column4: BRIEF-S.A's Competition Commission approves Microsoft's LinkedIn deal
column5: * Approved  without conditions  intermediate merger whereby Microsoft intends to acquire LinkedIn  Further company coverage:

column4: BRIEF-Nvidia posts Q3 earnings per share $0.94
column5: * Nvidia announces financial results for third quarter fiscal 2017
Nov 10 Nvidia Corp reported a 53.6 percent jump in quarterly revenue  helped by strong demand for the company's graphics processing chips used in personal computers and data centers.
